front.title: IEEE Application Guide for High Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a symmetrical current Basis

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This application guide applies to AC high-voltage circuit breakers rated in accordance with the methods given in American National Standard Rating Structure for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers, C37.04-1964 (R 1969) and listed in American National Standard Preferred Ratings and Related Required Capabilities for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers, C37.06-1971. Circuit breakers rated and manufactured to meet other standards, or used in switchgear assemblies, should be applied in accordance with application procedures adapted to their specific ratings or applications.
